title: Fischer Women’s Nordic Winter Sports Cross Country Skiing Non Slip Warm XC Pro Boots
features: FISCHER WOMEN’S XC PRO BOOTS - The women’s XC Pro boots are ideal boots for active women who want to take their Nordic skiing to the next level
FRESH TECHNOLOGY - Fischer Fresh puts an end to unpleasant smells, giving you lasting freshness inside the women’s XC Pro boots
LACE COVER - Lace covers for additional protection against the snow and wet conditions and to give you a comfortable warm feeling when skiing down the hill or in the mountains
TURNAMIC TOURING SOLE - The flat construction enables a safe walk to the track and good balance on the skis and acts as an insulation layer against the cold
INTERNAL MOLDED HEEL CAP - Internal anatomically shaped heel cap is very light and individually thermoformable for all-day comfort
description: The ideal boot for skiers who want to take their Nordic skiing further: Fischer's XC Pro WS. The proven, comfortable Fischer fit, and a full lace cover to keep the snow out provide all-day comfort. The addition of Fischer Fresh helps control odors. PRODUCT FEATURES: Lace covers for additional protection against the snow and wet conditions and to give you a comfortable warm feeling. The right fit for all requirements. Whether it's shaped for the female foot with the comfort or race version, customised for the feet of young skiers, meeting the comfort requirements of all-rounders or for direct power transfer in racing: the Boot Fit Concept with special lasts is the answer to all the different needs and morphologies of the various consumer groups
